issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
if nodemgr work directory has copy group from parent flag (often set on /tmp), chmod fails to set gid bit because owners group does not match caller group.

to chown first, then chmod

comments.body:
